mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.location, a.duststation, a.sunrise, a.sunset, a.weather0, a.temp0, a.humid0, a.weather1, a.temp1, a.time1, a.weather2, a.temp2, a.time2, a.weather3, a.temp3, a.time3, a.weather4, a.temp4, a.time4, a.weather5, a.temp5, a.time5, b.pm10v, b.pm10g, b.pm25v, b.pm25g FROM dominications AS a RIGHT JOIN dust_station AS b on a.duststation = b.name WHERE a.location = #{location}
